1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Parsing list of terms.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Term
7  ( termName, termNames, termNamesCo,
8    signedTermName, signedTermNames,
9    termNamePairs, termNamesColon,
10    picker,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax           as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data             as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message as Msg
17
18-- | Extract a term name.
19termName :: S.TTree -> B.Ab S.TermName
20termName (S.TermLeafName _ _ n) = Right n
21termName (S.TermLeaf _ _ [n])   = Right n
22termName _                      = Msg.reqTermName
23
24-- | Extract a list of term names.
25-- 
26--   >>> termNames B.<=< D.tt $ "/a /b /c"
27--   Right ["a", "b", "c"]
28termNames :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.TermName]
29termNames = mapM termName
30
31-- | Extract a signed term name.
32signedTermName :: S.TTree -> B.Ab S.SignedTermName
33signedTermName (S.TermLeafName _ sign n) = Right (sign, n)
34signedTermName _                         = Msg.reqTermName
35
36signedTermNames :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.SignedTermName]
37signedTermNames = mapM signedTermName
38
39termNamesCo :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab (Bool, [S.TermName])
40termNamesCo trees =
41    do (co, trees2) <- termCo trees
42       ns <- mapM termName trees2
43       Right (co, ns)
44
45-- Term complement symbol
46termCo :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab (Bool, [S.TTree])
47termCo (S.TextLeafRaw _ "~" : trees)  = Right (True,  trees)
48termCo trees                          = Right (False, trees)
49
50-- | Extract a list of name-and-name pairs.
51-- 
52--   >>> termNamePairs =<< D.tt "/a /x /b /y"
53--   Right [("/a", "/x"), ("/b", "/y")]
54termNamePairs :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.TermName2]
55termNamePairs = loop where
56    loop (a : b : xs) =
57        do a'  <- termName a
58           b'  <- termName b
59           xs' <- loop xs
60           Right $ (a', b') : xs'
61    loop [] = Right []
62    loop _  = Msg.reqTermName
63
64-- >>> termNamesColon =<< D.tt "/a /b : /x /y"
65-- Right [["a", "b"], ["x", "y"]]
66termNamesColon :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [[S.TermName]]
67termNamesColon = loop [] [] where
68    loop ret ns (S.TermLeafName _ _ n : ts) = loop ret (n : ns) ts
69    loop ret ns (S.TermLeaf _ _ [n] : ts)   = loop ret (n : ns) ts
70    loop ret ns (S.TextLeafRaw _ ":" : ts)  = loop (reverse ns : ret) [] ts
71    loop ret ns []                          = Right $ reverse $ reverse ns : ret
72    loop _ _ _                              = Msg.reqTermName
73
74picker :: D.Head -> [S.TermName] -> B.Map [c]
75picker he ts = B.snipFrom ind where
76    ind = ts `B.snipIndex` D.getTermNames he
77
